fields.name: MUXEN
fields.description: Multiplexed mode enable This bit enables the multiplexing of the two XSPIs.

fields.name: CSSEL_OVR_O1
fields.description: Chip select selector override setting for XSPI1.

fields.name: CSSEL_OVR_O2
fields.description: Chip select selector override setting for XSPI2.

fields.name: REQ2ACK_TIME
fields.description: REQ to ACK time In Multiplexed mode (MUXEN = 1), this field defines the time between two transactions.
